clause: Summary of changes We work hard to make our use of personal data transparent and to make your rights and choices easy to understand.
label: none

clause: We added more details on how we train the models that support our products and services including those using generative artificial intelligence, how long we keep your information, and changes to our international data transfer mechanisms.
label: none

clause: If you are outside of the EEA, Switzerland, or the United Kingdom, we’ve outlined how we may share data with partners to allow advertisers to reach you on other websites and apps.
label: none

clause: Our mission is to bring everyone the inspiration to create a life they love.
label: none

clause: To do that, we show you personalized content and ads we think you’ll be interested in based on information we collect from you and other parties.
label: none

clause: We wrote this policy to help you understand what information we collect, how we use it and what choices you have about it.
label: none

clause: Some of the concepts below are a little technical, but we’ve tried our best to explain things in a simple and clear way.
label: none

clause: Scope of the Privacy Policy This is Pinterest’s global Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: We have highlighted below where a particular section applies to you based on where you live.
label: none

clause: We collect information in a few different ways 1.
label: none

clause: When you give it to us or give us permission to obtain it When you use Pinterest websites, apps, services, technologies, APIs, widgets, or any other products, like Shuffles, or features we offer (“Pinterest” or the “Services”), you voluntarily share certain information.
label: none

clause: Account Information: When you join our Services, we collect information like your name, email address, birthday, gender, country of residence, your interests, and preferred language.
label: none

clause: If you have a business account, depending on where you live, you may also have the option to add race and ethnicity information to your profile.
label: none

clause: Content: We collect information when you save or upload Pins, photos, or other content, interact with Pins or other content (for example, commenting or adding a Pin), or where you send messages and interact with other users.
label: none

clause: Precise location information: Depending on where you live, you can choose to share your precise location using your device settings.
label: location

clause: Your communications with us: If you contact us for customer support or otherwise communicate with us, we collect the content of these communications.
label: none

clause: Your contacts: If you previously chose to sync your contacts with your account, we will continue to process certain information about your contacts who are Pinterest users to help you find one another on our Services.
label: none

clause: We also get technical information when you use Pinterest When you use a website, mobile application or other internet service, certain internet and electronic network activity information gets created and logged automatically.
label: none

clause: This is also true when you use Pinterest.
label: none

clause: Here are some of the types of information we collect: Device information: We collect information about the device you use to access our Services, including the type of device, operating system, network service provider, settings, and unique device identifiers.
label: tracking

clause: Log data: When you use our Services, our servers record information (“log data”), including information that your browser automatically sends whenever you visit a website, or that your mobile app automatically sends when you’re using it.
label: none

clause: This log data includes, for example, your Internet Protocol (IP) address, activity on websites you visit that incorporate Pinterest features (like the “Save” button) browser type and settings, and the date and time of when you accessed the Services.
label: none

clause: You can learn more about the log data we collect here.
label: none

clause: Information from cookies and similar technologies: We also use “cookies” or similar technologies to obtain log data.
label: tracking

clause: For example, we use cookies to store your language preferences or other settings so you don‘t have to set them up every time you visit Pinterest.
label: tracking

clause: For more information about how we use cookies, please review our Cookie Policy.
label: tracking

clause: Usage data and inferences: When you’re on our Services, we use your activity—such as which Pins you click on, terms you search for, boards you create, and any text that you add in a comment or description—along with other information you’ve provided when you first signed up and information from our partners and advertisers to make inferences about you and your preferences.
label: none

clause: For example, if you create a board about travel, we may infer you are a travel enthusiast.
label: none

clause: We may also infer other information, such as your education or professional experience.
label: none

clause: Location Information: We use your IP address to infer your approximate location, even if you don't choose to share your precise location, and photos you share may include information about the location where they were taken.
label: location

clause: User Choices: We will keep a record of choices you’ve selected in your settings, including privacy settings and whether you have enabled notifications.
label: none

clause: Our partners and advertisers share information with us We also receive information about you and your activity outside Pinterest from our affiliates, advertisers, partners and other third parties we work with.
label: data_sharing

clause: For example: Third party platforms: If you register for or log into the Service using a third party platform (like Facebook or Google), they will furnish certain information to us to facilitate your account creation or log-in with us.
label: data_sharing

clause: In addition, if you connect your third-party accounts to our Services, we may use information from those accounts to improve your experience.
label: data_sharing

clause: Further, some third-party applications use Pinterest features such as our “Save” button, or you may install our “Save” button for your browser.
label: data_sharing

clause: If so, we collect log data from those sites or apps, including usage data.
label: none

clause: Technical service partners: We sometimes receive information about you from technical service partners, including from marketing firms.
label: none

clause: Advertisers or other partners: Online advertisers or third parties provide information to us about you to measure, report on or improve the performance of ads on Pinterest, or to help us better understand what kinds of ads to show you on Pinterest.
label: none

clause: For example, we may receive information about your visits to an advertiser's site, or purchases you made from them, or information about your interests from a third-party service, which we might use to help show you ads on the Service.
label: data_sharing

clause: Sometimes we get this information through the Pinterest Tag (a piece of code an advertiser puts on their site), which delivers insights to us and our ad partners about actions that a person takes on their website after viewing an ad on our Services.
label: none

clause: Learn more about the Pinterest Tag and the types of information advertisers or other third parties share with us.
label: none

clause: You can control how we use this information to personalize your experience and the ads you see on Pinterest in your Privacy and Data Settings.
label: none

clause: How we use the info we collect We’re committed to showing you content that’s relevant, interesting and personal to you.
label: none

clause: To do that, we use your information to provide and improve your experience, including to: Identify you when you use our Services.
label: none

clause: Recommend Pins, boards, or content you might like based on your activity on our Services and your offsite behavior.
label: none

clause: For example, if we see you’re into cooking-related ads or content on Pinterest, we may suggest food-related Pins to you.
label: none

clause: Similarly, if you visit websites that sell electric guitars, we may suggest guitar Pins to you.
label: none

clause: For more information on how we recommend content to you, please visit our Terms of Service.
label: none

clause: We use your info to suggest other people who have similar interests.
label: none

clause: For example, if you follow interior design boards, we may suggest interior designers that you might like.
label: none

clause: We also use data to help your friends and contacts find you on Pinterest.
label: none

clause: For example, people can search for your account on Pinterest using your email.
label: none

clause: If you previously chose to sync your contacts with your Pinterest account, we will process certain information about your contacts who are Pinterest users to help you find them on our Services.
label: none

clause: Allow searching with photos, if you choose.
label: none

clause: For example, if you take a photo of a pair of shoes or a piece of furniture you like, you can ask us to show you similar items.
label: none

clause: You can opt in to this in your device operating system settings.
label: none

clause: Depending on where you live, and with your consent, identify your precise location and customize your experience on our Services.
label: location

clause: For example, if we know that you’re near a retailer we may show you that retailer’s Pins that may be of interest to you.
label: none

clause: You can opt in to (and out of) this in your device operating system settings.
label: none

clause: Send you updates, including by email, push notification, SMS, or phone.
label: none

clause: You can unsubscribe from our promotional emails at any time and decide to stop getting other notifications by updating your settings.
label: none

clause: We use your information in our efforts to improve our Services, keep our users and the public safe, and to protect legal interests.
label: none

clause: To do so, we: Review your activity and messages on our Services to detect spam, enforce our Terms and policies, or activity that poses a risk to our community or the public.
label: none

clause: This can include working with law enforcement to keep Pinterest safe.
label: none

clause: Analyze users’ log data and device information to identify and investigate suspicious behavior or violations of our policies or Terms.
label: none

clause: Conduct age verification, as appropriate.
label: none

clause: This may include facial age estimation and matching your face against a government ID.
label: none

clause: May access user information in relation to a legal claim, litigation, or regulatory proceeding.
label: none

clause: Conduct analytics and research on who is using our Services and what they are doing.
label: none

clause: For example, by logging how often people use two different versions of a feature on Pinterest, we can understand which version is better.
label: none

clause: Improve the products and services of our family of companies and offer new features.
label: none

clause: For example, using information to train, develop and improve our technology such as our machine learning models, regardless of when Pins were posted.
label: none

clause: This includes, for example, Pinterest’s body type technology, which is trained on images in Pins posted to our Services.
label: none

clause: Pinterest also has features that are supported by generative artificial intelligence technology.
label: none

clause: Create aggregated or de-identified information that cannot reasonably be used to identify you.
label: none

clause: Pinterest processes, maintains, and uses this information only in a de-identified fashion for the purposes of this Privacy Policy and will not attempt to re-identify such information.
label: none

clause: We also use your information to personalize the ads you see Specifically, we use the information we collect to: Decide which ads to show you directly on Pinterest, and, depending on where you live, enabling Pinterest directly or through partners to show you ads both on and off Pinterest.
label: none

clause: For example, if you show an interest in camping tents on Pinterest or browse sleeping bags on one of our partner’s websites, we may show you ads for other outdoor products.
label: none

clause: Depending on your age, location and privacy settings, we customize the ads we show you by identifying your interests based on your onsite and offsite activities, as well as by using information we receive from ad partners or other third parties.
label: none

clause: We also offer features supported by generative artificial intelligence to enable our advertisers to add limited content to their ads.
label: none

clause: Where we use cookies to identify your offsite interests, we’ll get your consent where required.
label: tracking

clause: Advertise Pinterest products and services to you on other sites and apps.
label: none

clause: To do this, we disclose information such as cookie IDs, your IP address, or a hashed version of your email address to third parties, such as Facebook Ads, Google Marketing Platform, and others who may combine that information with other information they already have about you and deliver ads about Pinterest to you.
label: none

clause: Learn more about our marketing practices off Pinterest and how to opt-out.
label: none

clause: Tell our ad partners how their Pinterest ads are doing, and how to make them better.
label: none

clause: We disclose information about the ads you see or interact with on Pinterest to our advertisers and third-party companies to improve the performance of the ads that we or they use to measure or improve the delivery and performance of ads or content on websites and apps.
label: data_sharing

clause: For example, we would report to an advertiser that a certain percentage of people who viewed a Pin went on to visit that advertiser's site.
label: none

clause: Depending on where you live and your settings, we may also disclose this information at an individual level.
label: none

clause: For example, we would let an advertiser know that a particular Pin has been saved by certain people.
label: none

clause: To find out more about reporting on ads please visit the Help Center.
label: none

clause: Some of these activities may be considered “targeted advertising” “sharing” or “selling” as those terms are defined under certain state privacy laws in the US.
label: none

clause: You can opt out of Pinterest using and disclosing your information for these purposes.
label: none

clause: To do so, visit your Privacy and Data Settings.
label: none

clause: When we use cookies to learn about your behavior on or off of our services, we or our partners will obtain consent that we may need under applicable law.
label: tracking

clause: To find out more about how we use cookies, please see our Cookie Policy.
label: tracking

clause: Additional Info for EEA, Swiss and UK Data Subjects: Legal bases we rely on where we use your information The below section only applies for residents in the EEA, Switzerland, and UK.
label: none

clause: Under applicable data protection law in the European Region (such as the GDPR), companies must have a legal justification to process your information for the various purposes described in this Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: You also have particular rights available to you depending on which legal basis we use, and we’ve explained these below.
label: none

clause: We use info based on legitimate interests We use info to comply with our legal obligations We use info where you give us consent Where we rely on consent, you can withdraw that consent at any time.
label: none

clause: Your Rights and Choices We offer you certain choices to control your data.
label: none

clause: Depending on where you live (e.g., EEA, Switzerland, UK, U.S.), these choices may also be privacy rights you have under local law.
label: none

clause: To exercise these rights, please visit your account settings and, if you still need help, our Help Center.
label: none

clause: Access: You can request access to the information we collect and hold about you in a portable format.
label: none

clause: You can find more information about this through our Help Center.
label: none

clause: Correction/rectification: You can correct your information by updating information in your profile.
label: none

clause: Deletion/erasure: You can have your information deleted.
label: none

clause: In your settings, select “Delete your data and account” and follow the instructions.
label: none

clause: Opt out of “targeted advertising” “sharing” or “sale”: As explained above some of our activities may constitute “targeted advertising,” “sharing,” or “selling” as those terms are defined under certain state privacy laws in the U.S.
label: none

clause: You may opt out at any time by following the instructions in your Privacy and Data Settings menu.
label: none

clause: Note that you will still see ads on our Services, but they will not be informed by offsite data.
label: none

clause: Where we rely on consent, you can withdraw that consent at any time.
label: none

clause: Additional rights in the EEA, Switzerland, and the UK For any of the privacy rights and choices referenced, you can also submit a request to our DPO regarding the use and disclosure of your information.
label: none

clause: We will not discriminate against you if you choose to exercise your rights or options related to your personal information.
label: none

clause: These rights may be limited, for example if fulfilling your request would reveal personal data about another person, where they would infringe the rights of a third party (including our rights) or if you ask us to delete information which we are required by law to keep or have compelling legitimate interest to keep.
label: data_sharing

clause: If we deny your request to exercise your rights, you may have the right to appeal our decision by contacting us using privacy-support@pinterest.com.
label: none

clause: You have choices regarding your information on Pinterest.
label: none

clause: If you have a Pinterest account, many of these controls are built directly into Pinterest or your settings.
label: none

clause: For example, you can: Edit information in your profile, Link or unlink your Pinterest account from other services (like Facebook or Google), Edit secret board settings, and Close your account at any time.
label: none

clause: We also support settings such as tracking settings on iOS and Android devices.
label: tracking

clause: You may also have choices available to you through the device or software you use to access Pinterest.
label: none

clause: For example: The browser you use may let you control cookies or other types of local data storage.
label: tracking

clause: Your mobile device lets you choose how and whether your precise location, photos, and other data is shared with us.
label: location

clause: states and have enabled an opt-out preferences signal (such as Global Privacy Control), we will respect this preference when you use Pinterest.
label: none

clause: How and when we share information Anyone can see the public content you post, such as boards and Pins you create and public profile information you give us.
label: data_sharing

clause: Depending on where you live, we also make this public information available through what are called APIs (a technical way to share information quickly).
label: data_sharing

clause: For example, a partner can study what their most popular Pins are or how their Pins are being shared on Pinterest by using a Pinterest API.
label: none

clause: We also share the categories of information described above: With other services, at your direction.
label: none

clause: For example, when you decide to link your Pinterest account to third party services, or when you publish your content on Pinterest to such services, you direct disclosure of certain information to those services.
label: data_sharing

clause: Creators may direct us to share information with advertisers or other partners for paid engagements.
label: data_sharing

clause: Depending on where you live, and your privacy settings, we share data for advertising and related purposes, including showing you ads about Pinterest on third-party services, enabling partners to show you ads both on and off Pinterest, and helping advertisers understand how ads on Pinterest perform.
label: data_sharing

clause: For example, when you fill out a lead ad form, or click on an ad on Pinterest, we’ll share information related to that action with advertising partners.
label: data_sharing

clause: We may also provide partners with information about you so that advertisers can show you ads on or off of Pinterest.
label: none

clause: Learn more about how we support third-party advertising and the settings you have to manage it here.
label: data_sharing

clause: With vendors that we employ to process information on our behalf based on our instructions and for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.
label: none

clause: For example, we share data with security consultants to help us get better at identifying spam.
label: none

clause: Some information we acquire may be collected by vendors on our behalf.
label: none

clause: With law enforcement agencies, government agencies, researchers, or other parties in compliance with laws, rules, or regulations.
label: none

clause: For example, we may get requests for account information from law enforcement authorities like the police or courts.
label: none

clause: We only disclose information in response to such requests if we believe that disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with a law, regulation or legal request; to protect the safety, rights, or property of the public, any person, or Pinterest; or to detect, prevent, or otherwise address fraud, security or technical issues.
label: none

clause: We may also share information if we believe it is necessary to prevent imminent and serious bodily harm to a person in emergency situations.
label: data_sharing

clause: To find out more about how we respond to law enforcement requests, please see our Law Enforcement Guidelines.
label: none

clause: We may share your publicly accessible information with independent researchers who meet certain criteria, to combat societal harms.
label: none

clause: With our corporate family of companies, including wholly-owned subsidiaries and affiliates.
label: none

clause: If we were to engage in a merger, acquisition, bankruptcy, dissolution, reorganization, or similar transaction or proceeding that involves the transfer of the information described in this Privacy Policy, we would share your information with a party involved in such a process (for example, a potential purchaser).
label: none

clause: Transferring your information Pinterest is a worldwide service.
label: none

clause: By using our products or services, you authorize us to transfer and store your information outside your home country, including in the United States, for the purposes described in this policy.
label: none

clause: The privacy protections and the rights of authorities to access your personal information in such countries may not be equivalent to those of your home country.
label: none

clause: Additional steps for data transfers in the EEA, Switzerland, and the UK How long we keep your information We keep your information only so long as we need it to provide Pinterest to you and fulfill the purposes described in this policy.
label: none

clause: When we no longer need to use your information and there is no need for us to keep it to comply with our legal or regulatory obligations, we’ll either remove it from our systems or depersonalize it so that we can't use it to identify you.
label: none

clause: Additional information if you live in the EEA, Switzerland, and the UK Our policy on children's information Children under 13 are not allowed to use Pinterest.
label: none

clause: If you are based in a state or country with an older age requirement, you may only use the Services if you are at or over the age at which you can provide consent to data processing.
label: none

clause: Please visit the Help Center for more information.
label: none

clause: How we make changes to this policy We may change this policy from time to time and if we do, we’ll post any changes on this page.
label: none

clause: If you continue to use Pinterest after those changes are in effect, the new policy applies to you.
label: none

clause: If the changes are significant, we may provide a more prominent notice, such as by sending you an email.
label: none
